Translations.Text: sura phunkatani sathe ja dareka potani kabaro manthi (uthi) potana palanahara tarapha calava lagase
kaheva lagase, haya aphasosa! Amane amara sapanana sthalethi kone jagadya? A ja che, jenum vacana rahamane apyum hatum ane payagambaro'e sacum kahi didhum hatum
a eka cisa sivaya kami nathi, acanaka dareke dareka amari samaksa hajara kari devamam avase
basa! Ajana divase ko'i vyakti upara, thodoka pana atyacara karavamam nahim ave ane tamane tamara karmono ja badalo apavamam avase
jannati loko aja na divase potana karyomam khusa che
te ane temani patni'o chanyadamam asano para takiya lagavine betha hase
temana mate jannatamam dareka prakarana phalo hase, uparanta te'o je pana icchase, (te badhum ja malase)
dayalu palanahara taraphathi temane"salama" kahevamam avase
he aparadhi'o! Aje tame alaga tha'i java
he adamana santano! Sum mem tamari pasethi vacana na lidhum hatum? Ke tame setanani bandagi na karaso, te tamaro khullo satru che
ane mari ja bandagi karajo, satya marga a ja che
setane tamara manthi ghana lokone pathabhrasta kari didha, sum tame samajata nathi
a ja te jahannama che, jenum vacana tamane apavamam avatu hatum
potana inkarano badalo melavava mate aje amam dakhala tha'i java
ame ajana divase temana modha upara mahora lagavi da'isum ane temana hatha amari sathe vata-cita karase ane temana paga saksi apase, te karyoni, je te'o karata hatam
Jo ame icchata to temane drstihina kari deta, pachi a loko marga melavava mate bhagadoda karata, parantu te loko kevi rite jo'i sake
ane jo ame icchata to temani jagya para ja temana modha badali deta, pachi na to te'o cali sakata ane na to pacha phari sakata
